Steve Randall Allen, amụrụ n'afọ 1954, bụ onye America na-ese ihe. A maara Maazị Allen màkà ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe nkè United States Olympic & Paralympic Committee, malite na 1996 Summer Olympics.  N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, Maazị Allen malitere atụmatụ ọtụtụ nde dollar iji nye onyinye nka ahọpụtara na kọleji na mahadum ndị Black Historically.
